Peaks Recovery Services

Caring for the Colorado Springs Community

Call Now

Colorado Springs Counseling Services

Peaks Recovery Services is a community based IOP program serving the greater Colorado Springs area. Our program specifically works with both young adults (18-35) and working professionals who struggle with substance use disorder and process addictions. We also incorporate an integrative dual diagnosis approach as part of treatment.

Read More -->

Dual Diagnosis Treatment

Dual Diagnosis refers to individuals who struggle with both a mental illness and substance use disorder. Often times, mental health issues are the root causes for prolonged substance use. By addressing the underlying issues of the substance use disorder, treatment becomes more effective and individuals are able to develop longer, more reliable coping mechanisms in the process.

Read More -->

Intake Process

Extended treatment matters, national relapse rates for individuals coming out of 30-45 day programs is around 75% within the first year. If an individual can stay sober for up to a year, relapse rates plummet by over 50%. Whether you are coming from a treatment program or not, we offer a wide variety of clinical services to help you get back on your feet. Click below to get started.

Read More -->

Contact Us

If you would like to learn more about our program, please click Contact Now and a representative from Peaks will contact you within 24 hours.

Verify Insurance

Peaks Recovery Services are out-of-network providers and work with most insurance PPO plans. Please submit your insurance information below and a representative from our company will contact you within 24-hours regarding your insurance benefits. If you are interested in cash payment options please contact our admissions line directly at 1-888-506-9818.

A Caring Recovery

Call Now

Everyday millions of individuals and their families are affected by substance use disorder. Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability. We believe it paramount to the long-term success for both young adults and professionals that they continue with extended care treatment. Our client’s personal growth and recovery from alcohol and substance abuse is our highest priority. It’s why we do what we do. At Peaks Recovery Services we value how special your loved one is and we are committed to their long-term recovery and personal growth.
